title: Get Custom Fields
name: Get_Custom_Fields
description: Gets list of custom fields for the account

Response Fields.description: array of string values for select type fields
data name for the field (used to access it in searches, etc.)
whether field must have a value before video can be active
maximum number of custom fields for the account
data name for the field (used to access it in searches, etc.)
whether field must have a value before video can be active

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "custom_fields": [
        {
            "description": "Add a topic",
            "display_name": "Subject",
            "enum_values": [
                "Reptiles",
                "Mammals",
                "Other",
                "wildlife",
                "Fish",
                "Birds",
                "Insects"
            ],
            "id": "subject",
            "required": false,
            "type": "enum"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Uploader UserID",
            "id": "uploader-userid",
            "required": false,
            "type": "string"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Rating",
            "id": "rating",
            "required": false,
            "type": "string"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Duration",
            "id": "duration",
            "required": false,
            "type": "string"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Associatedtopics",
            "id": "associated-topics",
            "required": false,
            "type": "string"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Custom Theme Path",
            "enum_values": [
                "http://files.brightcove.com/ *    BCL_customLabelTheme2.css",
                "http://files.brightcove.com/ *    BCL_customLabelTheme.css"
            ],
            "id": "customthemepath",
            "required": false,
            "type": "enum"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Text Color",
            "enum_values": [
                "#4C4D4F",
                "#CF0050",
                "#F4901E",
                "#619FA8"
            ],
            "id": "textcolor",
            "required": false,
            "type": "enum"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Captions File URL",
            "id": "dfxppath",
            "required": false,
            "type": "string"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Purpose",
            "enum_values": [
                "Training",
                "Demo",
                "Sample",
                "Solution"
            ],
            "id": "purpose",
            "required": false,
            "type": "enum"
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "display_name": "Downloadable",
            "enum_values": [
                "yes",
                "no"
            ],
            "id": "downloadable",
            "required": false,
            "type": "enum"
        }
    ],
    "max_custom_fields": 10,
    "standard_fields": [
        {
            "description": null,
            "id": "description",
            "required": false
        },
        {
            "description": null,
            "id": "tags",
            "required": false
        }
    ]
}

title: Get Videos in Folder
name: Get_Videos_in_Folder
description: Gets list of video objects in a folder

Response Fields.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
whether video is force-stopped at the cue point
whether video is AD_ENABLED (used by the Smart Player, not by the Brightcove Player)
if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing
whether geo-restriction is enabled for thie video
URL for the default poster source image
URL for the default thumbnail source image
video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
state determines whether the video is playable or not
map of the sharing properties for the video
whether the video was shared from another account
id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
whether the video is shared to another account
whether the video is shared by reference

title: Create Playlist
name: Create_Playlist
description: Update a new playlist

Request Body Fields.description: maximum number of videos to include (smart playlists only)
number of videos to skip in the response
search string - see search guide for details. Only search by tags is available for playlists.
field to sort results by; if absent and there is a search string, results are sorted by relevance or if there is no search string, results are sorted by updated_at descending

Response Field.description: the playlist type: EXPLICIT or smart playlist type
search string to retrieve the videos (smart playlists only)

examples.title: Success Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
    "account_id": "57838016001",
    "created_at": "2015-09-20T18:50:27.865Z",
    "description": "My new bird playlist",
    "favorite": false,
    "id": "4492151631001",
    "name": "Bird Videos",
    "reference_id": null,
    "type": "EXPLICIT",
    "updated_at": "2015-09-20T18:50:27.865Z",
    "video_ids": [
        "4084164751001",
        "734484322001",
        "734462570001"
    ]
}

id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video

title: Create Video
name: Create_Video
description: Create a new video object in the account. Note: this does not ingest a video file - use the Dynamic Ingest API for ingestion

Request Body Fields.description: video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
state determines whether the video is playable or not
if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing
whether geo-restriction is enabled for thie video

Response Fields.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
whether video is force-stopped at the cue point
whether video is AD_ENABLED (used by the Smart Player, not by the Brightcove Player)
if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing
whether geo-restriction is enabled for thie video
URL for the default poster source image
URL for the default thumbnail source image
the original file name for the uploaded video
video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
state determines whether the video is playable or not
map of the sharing properties for the video
whether the video was shared from another account
id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
whether the video is shared to another account
whether the video is shared by reference

title: Get Videos
name: Get_Videos
description: Gets a page of video objects

URL Parameters.description: number of videos to skip in the response
field to sort results by; if absent and there is a search string, results are sorted by relevance or if there is no search string, results are sorted by updated_at descending

Response Fields.description: time of the cue point in seconds; example: 10.527
whether video is force-stopped at the cue point
whether video is AD_ENABLED (used by the Smart Player, not by the Brightcove Player)
id for the folder the video belongs to
if true, country array is treated as a list of countries excluded from viewing
whether geo-restriction is enabled for thie video
URL for the default poster source image
URL for the default thumbnail source image
the original file name for the uploaded video
video reference-id (must be unique within the account)
state determines whether the video is playable or not
map of sharing properties (applicable only to multiple accounts)
whether the video was shared from another account
id of the account that shared the video; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
id of the video in its original account; note that this field is populated only for the shared copy, not for the original video
whether the video is shared to another account
whether the video is shared by reference
